English: lit. idly poke a stick in the mud and it grows into a tree to shade you

h.b: ㄨˊ　ㄒㄧㄣ　ㄔㄚ　ㄌㄧㄡˇ　ㄌㄧㄡˇ　ㄔㄥˊ　ㄧㄣ

d.f: （`諺語~）`無意間~`的~`舉動~，`竟~`產生~`意想不到~`的~`結果~。

h.p: wú xīn chā liǔ liǔ chéng yīn

English: lit. idly poke a stick in the mud and it grows into a tree to shade you
(fig.) unintentional actions may bring unexpected success
also written `無心插柳柳成蔭~|`无~`心~`插~`柳~`柳~`成~荫
